body:
I have been thinking about this for a while.Prestiging is when you reset yourself to lvl 1 and gets star by your name. That's all. I suggest that we get little rewards for prestiging. 

Prestige in Nexus and Nebula: you get a common item from the shop when you start and the later presitges you get an increased chance of getting a rare item from the shop

Prestige in elimination and walls: You start out with some items that are commonly found/built and the later prestiges you get more rare items.

Prestige in Avicade (if this is possible): better melee weapon in OTiC, speed 1 in Minatour(Unless your the minatour), and an enderpearl in Red Alert.

title: Prestiging (need more stuff)
